summary: The text discusses the regulations related to the management of telecommunications services in Nepal. It highlights the provisions for obtaining licenses and permissions for various activities related to telecommunications services. The regulations also cover the definition of terms such as "telecommunications service provider" and outline the procedures for obtaining permits for different types of events and activities in designated venues. The text emphasizes the importance of adhering to the regulations and obtaining necessary approvals before conducting any telecommunications-related activities.

दलको सदस्यता प्राप्त हुने तथा गुम्ने ५ . अवस्था,
दलको केन्द्रीय समिति प्रदेश समिति र स्थानीय तहमा रहने पदाधिकारीको विवरण, ७.
दलको केन्द्रीय समिति प्रदेश समिति तहका पदाधिकारीको निर्वाचन र स्थानीय र मनोनयन
बैठक बैठक बोलाउने र निर्णय गर्ने कार्यविधि दलको विभिन्न समिति वा इकाईको
सदस्य वा पदाधिकारीलाई हुन सक्ने अनुशासनात्मक कारबाही, ० ९.
दलको कोष आर्थिक व्यवस्थापन त्यसको लागि जिम्मेवार पदाधिकारी,
लेखा, लेखापरीक्षण तथा लेखा परीक्षण समिति सम्बन्धी व्यवस्था,
नीति तथा कार्यक्रम निर्माणमा वा तल्ला निकायलाई सहभागी गराउने प्रक्रिया,
विघटन हुने अवस्था र विघटन भएमा सम्पत्ति तथा दायित्वको व्यवस्थापन १८.
समानुपातिक समावेशी व्यवस्था, दलका विभिन्न समितिमा हुनु पर्ने
दलको सदस्यता तथा नवीकरण शुल्क सम्बन्धी व्यवस्था, २२.
दलको सदस्यता दर्ता किताब सम्बन्धी व्यवस्था २३.
summary: The text discusses the political party-related laws in Nepal, including amendments to the Political Parties Act of 2073. It outlines the process for formation, registration, and operation of political parties, as well as the regulation of their financial management. The aim is to make the existing legal framework more transparent and conducive to effective political governance. The text also defines key terms such as "election commission" and "political party" to clarify their roles and responsibilities within the legal framework.

summary: The text discusses the political party regulations in Nepal, including amendments to the Political Party Regulations of 2074. It outlines the procedures for registration and management of political parties, as well as the requirements for submitting documents and details to the Election Commission. The regulations also specify the timeline for announcing election results and the process for filing complaints and appeals. Additionally, it highlights the importance of adhering to the Constitution and relevant laws when registering a political party.

summary: The text discusses the establishment and regulation of Rajarshi Janak University in Nepal, focusing on various academic disciplines such as science, medicine, law, management, education, agriculture, tourism, and more. The law aims to provide quality higher education to the public, promote national development, and ensure competitive academic standards. It also outlines the structure and functions of the university, including research centers, faculties, and administrative positions. The law emphasizes the importance of creating a conducive academic and professional environment in line with the country's educational goals.
